abilities.name: Δ Plus
abilities.effect: If your opponent’s Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack of this Pokémon, take 1 more Prize card.

attacks.name: Wind Shard
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
